# Date

# Default

Code
<template>
  <Example>
    <template #demos>
    	<sf-date label="Date" v-model="value"/>
    </template>
	<template #result>
		{{ value }}
	</template>
  </Example>
</template>

<script>
export default {
	data() {
		return {
			value: ''
		}
	}
}
</script>

# Custom Format

Code
<template>
  <Example>
    <template #demos>
      	<sf-date label="Date" v-model="value" :format="customFormat" />
    </template>
	<template #result>
		{{ value }}			
	</template>
  </Example>
</template>

<script>
export default {
	data() {
		return {
			customFormat: 'yyyy-MM-dd',
			value: '',
		}
	}
}
</script>

# Bordered

Default
Color
Code
<template>
  <Example fullWidth>
    <template #demos>
		<span>Default</span>
    	<sf-date label="Date" v-model="value" border/>

		<span style="margin-top: 26px">Color</span>
    	<sf-date label="Date" v-model="value" border color="primary"/>
    	<sf-date label="Date" v-model="value" border color="success"/>
    	<sf-date label="Date" v-model="value" border color="warn"/>
    	<sf-date label="Date" v-model="value" border color="danger"/>
    </template>
  </Example>
</template>

<script>
export default {
	data() {
		return {
			value: ''
		}
	}
}
</script>

# Min - Max

Code
<template>
  <Example>
    <template #demos>
      <sf-date label="Date" v-model="value" color="danger" min="2020-12-20" max="2020-12-25"/>
    </template>
  </Example>
</template>

<script>
export default {
	data() {
		return {
			value: ''
		}
	}
}
</script>

# Readonly

Code
<template>
  <Example>
    <template #demos>
      <sf-date label="Date" v-model="value" readonly/>
    </template>
  </Example>
</template>

<script>
export default {
	data() {
		return {
			value: new Date().toLocaleString('pt-Br', { dateStyle: 'short'})
		}
	}
}
</script>

# Step

Code
<template>
  <Example>
    <template #demos>
      <sf-date label="Date" v-model="value" :step="3"/>
    </template>
  </Example>
</template>

<script>
export default {
	data() {
		return {
			value: ''
		}
	}
}
</script>

# Message

Default
Input your birthday
Color
Primary message
Success message
Warn message
Danger message
Code
<template>
  <Example fullWidth>
    <template #demos>
      <span>Default</span>
      <sf-date label="Date" v-model="value">
        <template #message>
          Input your birthday
        </template>
      </sf-date>


      <span style="margin-top: 26px">Color</span>
      <sf-date label="Date Primary" v-model="value">
        <template #message-primary>
          Primary message
        </template>
      </sf-date>

      <sf-date label="Date Success" v-model="value">
        <template #message-success>
          Success message
        </template>
      </sf-date>

      <sf-date label="Date Warn" v-model="value">
        <template #message-warn>
          Warn message
        </template>
      </sf-date>

      <sf-date label="Date Danger" v-model="value">
        <template #message-danger>
          Danger message
        </template>
      </sf-date>
    </template>
  </Example>
</template>

<script>
export default {
	data() {
		return {
			value: ''
		}
	}
}
</script>
